DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to perform an evaluation of a trauma-focused short-term intervention (Narrative Exposure Therapy; Schauer, M., Neuner, F. & Elbert, T.) on a variety of clinical outcome measures (PTSD, Depression, Somatic Complaints, Dissociation) in women after sexual exploitation and women trafficking.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Narrative Exposure Therapy (NET) in Treating Women After Human Trafficking or Forced Prostitution
DOC.criteria: Sexual Exploitation or Women Trafficked or Forced Prostitution Symptoms of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder Current Psychotic Symptoms
